name: Apache Kafka
description: distributed event store and stream-processing platform - we use managed Kafka via Confluent

name: Apache Spark
description: multi-language engine for big data applications

name: AWS Aurora
description: Database engine for MySQL and PostgreSQL that is highly available and scales

name: AWS Sagemaker
description: cloud machine-learning platform (also interface for python)

name: AWS API Gateway
description: service for creating, publishing, maintaining, monitoring and securing REST, HTTP and WebSocket APIs at scale

name: AWS EKS
description: service for running and managing Kubernetes clusters

name: Behat
description: Cucumber style testing framework for PHP

name: Chromatic
description: Visual snapshot testing tool based on StorybookJS

name: Deptrac
description: Tool for enforcing internal project dependencies and structure/architecture

name: Docker Compose
description: Tool for spinning up multiple docker images locally in sync. Used for creating local developer environments

name: Domain Driven Design
description: Dev technique to extract business logic

name: Eloquent
description: ORM (Active Record pattern) - is not anymore adopted in xentral/xentral

name: Looker
description: data exploration and discovery business intelligence platform

name: Python
description: programming language; used to extract & transform data for BI/analytics purposes; also for data migration and complex data models

name: Kanban
description: Flexible work framework, which is used in the SRE team

name: Terraform
description: open-source infrastructure as code software tool

name: Zapier
description: tool for integrating web applications and automating workflows

name: Webcomponents?
description: A set of web API's allowing new custom, reusable, encapsulated HTML tags.
